name: LinkNest - Cross-Browser Bookmark Sync
description: Sync your bookmarks seamlessly across Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Brave & more. Login once, sync everywhere.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https: http://localhost:* http://127.0.0.1:*; object-src 'self';
